channel.title: Development on Valticus
channel.description: Recent content in Development on Valticus

item.title: Let's Talk About Fonts (Part 1)
item.description: Let’s face it - as developers we look at code 90% of our time we spend in front of the monitor. While there tons of fonts available for our favorite text editors, both free and paid, I have found one font in particular to be extremely enjoyable (and believe me - I’ve tried a few). That is - JetBrains Mono, a free and open source font from the very same company that brought us tools like WebStorm and PyCharm.

item.title: Valticus | Programming, IT, and more.
item.description: Welcome! You have taken a step closer to some interesting content. I hope you enjoy what I have to share.
